resources.string: The easiest way to manage your kernel settings
Grarak: KernelAdiutor (Code base)\ntopjohnwu: libsu\nLennoard Silva: Code Contributions, App Icon, & Portuguese (Brazilian) Translation
Add a short description about your kernel here (single line)!
Description for this profile is not provided by the developer.
Specify default profile name (including \'.sh\' extension) here!
Add credits text to be shown in the app as copyright!
Please Note: You\'re current configuration will be overwritten! Are you sure?
You\'re current configuration file is updated! The changes will be applied on next app launch.
How to add support in kernel

Kernel Profiler expects a configuration file (kernelprofiler.json) and one or more \'profiles\' (basically shell scripts) in certain specific structure placed inside \'/data/kernel_profiler\'. Please check \'Settings -> Developer Tools\' for more information.
Profile name shouldn\'t be empty! Aborting.
This app won\'t work without Root Access! Aborting.
%s is already assigned as the default profile!
%s is set as the default profile!
Profile Details shouldn\'t be empty! Aborting.
Permission denied for writing to storage!
If you like to appreciate my work, please consider buying SmartPack Donation Package from PlayStore as it is really helpful to continue my projects more active, although it is not at all necessary.
Add a link to the support page here!
Do this test only if you\'re preparing a configuration file for the current kernel!
Add your title here! (Important: Title should contain a matching word from \'uname -a\'. Click the button next to this text for checking!)
Please Note: This app is also equipped with necessary tools to create its support files. Please check \'Settings -> Developer Tools\' for more information.
Please ask your favourite kernel developer to add support to this app!
It seems like your kernel doesn\'t have the necessary configuration file/profiles to support this app.
%s is not a proper profile file! Aborting.
